{{Description|A kind of adventure found only in Simulanka. Once opened, you will encounter trials that try your courage, or riddles that test your wisdom. And wisdom and bravery are two indispensable qualities for exploring a fairytale world...|[[Map]] description}}
'''Hero's Journey''' are [[puzzles]] found during the [[Summertide Scales and Tales]] event around the [[Simulanka]] map that reward a [[Fairytale Trove]].

After using the [[Jocund Letters]] or [[Joyous Letters]] Gadgets, they are marked as {{Icon|Hero's Journey}}.
